#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
const LL MOD = 100000007;

LL gcd(LL a, LL b){return b?gcd(b, a%b):a;}

int T;
pair<LL, LL>p[4];


int main(){
	for(scanf("%d", &T); T--; ){

		for(int i=0; i<4; i++)scanf("%lld%lld", &p[i].first, &p[i].second);
		sort(p, p+4);

		p[0].first=abs(p[1].first-p[0].first);
		p[0].second=abs(p[1].second-p[0].second);

		LL s = (p[0].first*p[0].first + p[0].second*p[0].second)%MOD;
		LL ans, g;
		g=gcd(p[0].first, p[0].second)%MOD;
		ans = 2*s*(s-2*g +1)%MOD;
		for(;ans<0;)ans+=MOD;
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
